title: Login Issues
body: Since last week I've been unable to login to the game saying it wont connect to PVP.net rito can you explain whats going on?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me.

Let me know if that helps.

Hey I've had the same problem, and I've gone through a bunch of trouble shooting steps including switching to a public DNS and I've had no luck. I've noticed that now weirdly enough I can only log in with my VPN switched on with a Sydney IP location. (Tested it based on a thread I read of someone else having that issue) But with it off, no connection. I've also never used my VPN while playing, so this is really weird. Any help you can offer?

Hey there,

Sounds like a potential issue with your ISP, have you tried contacting them?

No I haven't, if theres nothing that anyone else can recommend I may just have to contact Foxtel about this issue. 
Not sure what they can do if everything else connects fine to the internet, only LoL is failing to connect. Thanks for you time.

>Not sure what they can do if everything else connects fine to the internet, only LoL is failing to connect. Thanks for you time.

It's possibly a routing issue on their end, I wasn't even aware foxtel offered internet services tbh. Thought they were just PayTV

I'm speaking with Foxtel now to try and fix the issue. They've had customers with the same issue before. Hopefully they know how to fix it I miss playing :( 
And yeah, they do have a phone, TV and broadband service.

And now I'm able to log back in. Hopefully people contact their ISP if they have the same problems. It was a matter of changing DNS through the Hub. 
Thanks for your help. Happy gaming everyone :)

Good to hear the issue was resolved swiftly, thanks for the information.

See you on the rift,
Seph
